mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHIPMENTS (ID, ORDERS_ID, ADDRESS_ID, TRACKING_NO, SHIP_COMPANY, STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (UUID(), #{orderId}, #{addressId}, #{trackingNo}, #{shipCompany}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE SHIPMENTS SET ORDERS_ID = #{orderId}, ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId}, TRACKING_NO = #{trackingNo}, SHIP_COMPANY = #{shipCompany}, STATUS = #{status}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SHIPMENTS WHERE ID IN ( ${id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SHIPMENTS WHERE orders_id = #{ordersId} LIMIT 0, 1
